TopicTitle: Can struts be attached in EVA construction?

Articles.Content: I know fuel lines can't be attached between two different vessels. Can I attach struts to two docked spacecraft to make the connection stronger?

Yes, you can - because two docked spacecraft aren't two spacecraft.   They are one. The docking procedure merges them into one vessel under the hood. As such, there is no problem with attaching parts to both of them.
As long as they’re docked (or klawed) together, they’re treated as one vessel and you can strut away. You can’t attach struts between two different vessels in EVA construction though.
